name: Jonathan Ayerbe
position: Partnerships, LATAM Working Group Lead, Strategy Advsior
description: Founder, Investor & Advisor. CEO of a LATAM startup accelerator & collisioner. Working on decentralizing and disrupting health; travel and work and real estate. Metaverse builder

name: Manan Patel
description: Founder with 10+ years of experience in development and consulting services to Fortune 100 enterprises. Founding team member of Ocean Protocol. Blockchain Expert and Crypto thought leader.

description: Founder, Author, and Award Winning Fashion Designer creating luxe experiences for the Metaverse. DAO Branding Group Lead. Passionate about education and access to the crypto economy.

name: Peter Rafelson
description: Produced and written over thirty #1 hit records selling over 180,000,000 units. Working with all major studios and has developed a small entertainment empire in North Hollywood.

description: Lawyer specialized in Blockchain and FinTech.

name: Manuel Müller
description: Enabler for blockchain projects in terms of business development, sales & fundraising. Active advisor to blockchain startups since 2017.

name: Harald Horrmann
description: International executive, advisor and founder with profound expertise in various tech industries. Always questioning the status quo.

name: Sebastian Rocha
description: Entrepreneur and DeFI enthusiast. Working on solutions for the frictionless use and movement of capital.

name: Andres Fonseca
description: Tech entrepreneur, economist, science enthusiast and Matrix believer. Constantly searching new ways to solve problems with the use of AI.

name: Wolfgang Männel
description: Wolfgang Männel is a Venture Capital Investor in the Blockchain Space. In over 30 years of his international career, he has combined experience as an investor, consultant, and entrepreneur.

name: Sagar Barvaliya
description: Sagar is an Investment Manager at Blockrocket, A leading investor for early-stage blockchain-based startups. He is in charge of Blockrocket’s startup sourcing as well as portfolio management. An ex-Engineer with several years of work experience in the automotive sector of leading OEMs in Germany decided to dedicate his attention to the blockchain space a few years ago.

name: Max Zheng
description: Head of Corporate Development in a European VC focusing on blockchain startups. Built and advised multiple blockchain startups.

name: Federico Fernández
description: Economist, Investor & Advisor. COO of a LATAM startup accelerator & collisioner. Working on decentralizing and disrupting health; travel and work and real estate. Metaverse builder

name: Darryll Colthrust
description: Over 15 years of experience in business and technology strategy within retail, finance, publishing, real estate and media and entertainment.

name: Simon Olson
description: Venture Capital Investor and advisor at Founder Institute, Singularity University, Techstars, MIT Launch and Y-Combinator

name: Alexander Strober
description: Business Analyst with 5+ years of experience in finance and tech in the banking industry. Alex worked on several EVM based blockchain projects.

name: Marc Lanz
description: Co-founded, directed, owned and reinvented different companies and projects over the past 10 years, most of them in the digital sphere, delivering marketing strategies and overall business solutions for customers in diverse industries.

name: Riccardo Silvestri
description: 4+ years of experience in consulting and project management in Consumer Goods and Pharma. Strategic thinker and value builder.

name: Larry Pang
description: Head of Business Development at IoTex. Experienced strategy consultant working with 15+ Fortune 500 clients in the Tech & Finance sector.

name: Tomal Ganuly
description: Globally experienced manager with a strong passion for blockchain technology, the Automotive industry, and DLT related start-ups, consulting international corporations in terms of strategy and digitalization.

description: 15+ years of experience in international strategy and management consulting.

description: Managing Director of DECUS Network. All-in entrepreneur with a passion for challenging markets and disruptive technology.
